short_summary: ACAN - Non-Partisan Review Mechanism for Government of Canada Advertising
description: To review Government of Canada (GC) advertising against the definition of non-partisan communications, the advertising review criteria, and other elements, as outlined in the Policy on Communications and Federal Identity and the Directive on the Management of Communications.

=====================================

### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Title

* English: ACAN - Non-Partisan Review Mechanism for Government of Canada Advertising
* French: PAC - Mécanisme d’examen du caractère non partisan de la publicité du gouvernement du Canada

#### Tender Description

This tender is for the review of Government of Canada advertising against the definition of non-partisan communications, the advertising review criteria, and other elements, as outlined in the Policy on Communications and Federal Identity and the Directive on the Management of Communications.
